titles.title: Denial of Passports to Noncustodial Parents in Cases of Nonpayment of Child Support
Concerning denial of passports to noncustodial parents subject to State arrest warrants in cases of nonpayment of child support.
Denial of Passports to Noncustodial Parents in Cases of Nonpayment of Child Support

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Denial of Passports to Noncustodial Parents in Cases of Nonpayment of Child Support - Authorizes the Secretary of State to refuse, revoke, restrict, or limit a passport if the applicant or passport holder is a noncustodial parent who is the subject of an outstanding State arrest warrant for nonpayment of child support, where the amount in controversy is not less than $5,000.
